Container.Name: explo
Container.Overview:
Explo is an alternative to Spotify's "Discover Weekly". It automates music discovery by downloading recommended tracks based on your listening history. Using ListenBrainz for recommendations and Youtube for downloading.
Check project's github for additional environment variables: https://github.com/LumePart/Explo/blob/main/sample.env

Config.Name: Downloads
Config.Description: Has to be in the same path you have your music system pointed to (it's recommended to put explo under a subfolder)

Config.Name: Music System
Config.Description: Music system you use (jellyfin, mpd, plex or subsonic)

Config.Name: Music System URL
Config.Description: Address of music system (required for jellyfin, plex and subsonic)

Config.Name: Music System User
Config.Description: User which has admin access to the music server (required for subsonic and plex). Delete if not needed.

Config.Name: Musoc System Password
Config.Description: Password for the user (required for subsonic and plex). Delete if not needed.

Config.Name: API Key
Config.Description: API Key from music server (required for jellyfin). Delete if not needed.

Config.Name: Playlist Directory
Config.Description: Directory where to make m3u playlist files (required for mpd). Delete if not needed.
